item.description:

EDIT: Omg.

Exception encountered while parsing incoming packets from Ethan. java.lang.StringIndexOutOfBoundsException: String index out of range: -2 at java.lang.String.substring(Unknown Source) at java.lang.String.substring(Unknown Source) at client.customCommand(client.java:8115) at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:15468) at client.packetProcess(client.java:17209) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:271) at process.run(process.java:23) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) ClientHandler: Client Ethan disconnected (127.0.0.1)

item.title: [Delta] ::yell help [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

[code=java]
if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 0 && !muted) {
String text = command.substring(5);
yell("[" + text + “]” + “” + playerName + ": " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(5));

}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta] ::yell help [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @jmk600 jmk600
item.description:
@jmk600 wrote:

client.java:8115: cannot find symbol symbol : variable title location: class client yell("[" + title + "]" + "" + playerName + ": " + Character.toUp perCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(5)); ^ 1 error Press any key to continue . . .

Please help.

My ::yell:

[code]if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 0 && !muted) {
String text = command.substring(5);
yell("[" + title + “]” + “” + playerName + ": " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(5));

}[/code]
